title: Huna Blends
description: A 100% vegan juice bar, located at Pump Shoreditch, serves power shakes and chill bowls. All items are also gluten free, soy free and non-GMO with no artificial ingredients. All bowls and shakes are packed with fruits or vegetables, made with a variety of milks and boosted with superfoods such as maca and spirulina. The sorbet-style chill bowl meals are served with a variety of crunchy toppings, including toasted buckwheat, mixed seeds, crushed kale and flax chips. The super thick power shakes includes the acai fruit glow containing frozen acai pulp, strawberry, apple, hemp milk and burnt orange. Take-out is available.
